items.title: Instead of sipping Champagne on New Year’s Eve, it may be time to invest in it
items.description: There’s a solid market for collectable bubbly, say experts, even if prices for some bottles have declined in the past year.

items.title: Andy Cohen’s goal for New Year’s Eve? Get Anderson Cooper giggling.
items.description: The “Real Housewives” host also dishes his financial advice and spending habits — like running up big bills on this youthful hobby.

items.title: Warren Buffett is topping up his stake in this high-margin internet name
items.description: A regulatory filing shows Buffett has raised his stake in domain-name-registry company VeriSign.

items.title: Walgreens and Intel lead list of stocks in the S&P 500 that fell hardest in 2024
items.description: At the end of a second consecutive year during which the S&P 500 has risen more than 20%, two things investors need to remember are that time tends to...

items.title: It has been another disappointing year for bonds. Why now isn’t the time to throw in the towel.
items.description: Longer bond yields are on pace for their biggest four-year climb since 1981 — the tail end of Jimmy Carter’s presidency.
